dashboard_users_edit_form_helper_login_c: Your login must contain between 3 and 20 characters. It can include numbers, letters and the following characters: - _! # $ % & ' ^ ` { }
It can also contain full stops, provided that they are preceded by a permitted character and are not followed by another full stop.
dashboard_users_edit_message_success: Changes to the user are in progress. Please refresh the page in a few moments.
dashboard_users_edit_message_error: An error has occurred while editing the user. {{ error }}
